scripts.build:vector: npm run build:mdx && cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python vector_db_builder.py --html-dir html --output-dir vector_db && deactivate
scripts.build:vector:clean: npm run build:mdx && cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python vector_db_builder.py --clean --html-dir html --output-dir vector_db && deactivate
scripts.prebuild: npm run build:mdx && tsx bin/rss.ts && tsx bin/pyodide.ts && esbuild --bundle onload.ts --outfile=public/onload.js
scripts.check: npm run depcheck && npm run prettier && npm run eslint && npm run tsc
scripts.rag:build: npm run build:vector && cd rag && docker build -t geoffreychallen/rag-server:latest -t geoffreychallen/rag-server:$npm_package_version .
scripts.rag:push: npm run build:vector && cd rag && docker buildx build . --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8 --builder multiplatform --tag geoffreychallen/rag-server:latest --tag geoffreychallen/rag-server:$npm_package_version --push
scripts.rag:run: cd rag && docker compose up rag-server
scripts.rag:dev: cd rag && docker compose --profile dev up rag-server-dev
scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg VERSION=$npm_package_version --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git show --no-patch --format=%h) --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"` . -t geoffreychallen/www:latest && npm run docker:tag
scripts.docker:push: docker buildx build . --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8 --builder multiplatform --tag geoffreychallen/www:latest --tag geoffreychallen/www:$npm_package_version --push
scripts.k8s:devLogs: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl logs -f --tail=-1 -l app=dev-geoffreychallen-com --all-containers
scripts.k8s:edit: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl edit deployment www-geoffreychallen-com-deployment
scripts.k8s:editDev: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl edit deployment dev-geoffreychallen-com-deployment
scripts.k8s:logs: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl logs -f --tail=-1 -l app=www-geoffreychallen-com --all-containers
scripts.k8s:restart: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl rollout restart deployment www-geoffreychallen-com-deployment
scripts.k8s:restartDev: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl rollout restart deployment dev-geoffreychallen-com-deployment
scripts.k8s:restartRAG: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl rollout restart deployment rag-geoffreychallen-com-deployment
scripts.k8s:startDev: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl scale deployment dev-geoffreychallen-com-deployment --replicas=1
scripts.k8s:stopDev: kubectl config use-context geoffreychallen && kubectl scale deployment dev-geoffreychallen-com-deployment --replicas=0
